title: LFM Jungler and 2 subbs plat+
body:
Hey my name is Frost09 and I am starting a ranked team with the greatest and friendliest players. We will be competing in tournaments as well as climbing the ranked 5 ladder which we are looking forward too. Our team currently consists of 6 players: 1 challenger, 1 diamond 3, 3 soon to be 4 plats as a friend may sub along side his other team and 1 gold who decayed from gold 1. Now enough said about us we want to here about you. 

Ign: 
Division:
Sub or jg:
Are you willing to learn Jarvan?:
Goals:
Availability:
Skype:
Strengths:
Weaknesses:

replies.body:
ign: Moose
Division: plat 4
sub/jg: pref jg
am willing to learn j4 (but main shaco)
goal to reach diamond early in season
available most nights, and can work around a roster
skype and curse
strength in snowballing and counter jungling
weakness would be in shot calling, but i have a good idea of what i should be doing

Ign: Safehouse
Division: Plat 4
Sub or jg: jg
Are you willing to learn Jarvan?: Yes
Goals: Reach diamond and find a solid team to play with
Availability: Varies but everyday from 6:30pm WST and some days all day. Weekends vary as well but can make room where I please.
Skype: Yes
Strengths: good awareness of where the enemy jungler is and have a large champion pool in the jungle.
Weaknesses: can fall into the trap of ganking lanes that are too for behind and joining in on the feed, also heavy counter junglers can be an issue if the team has weak laners

Ign: ll Tolack ll
Division: Plat V
Sub or jg: jg
Are you willing to learn Jarvan?: Yes - I'm ~ok on him
Goals: Diamond S5
Availability: Most nights
Skype: yes

Already sent you a friend req
